creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Snow, Moon, and Flowers (Setsugekka 雪月花)
provenance: Yamanaka & Co.; Charles L. Freer (1904-05); David T. Ford (1905-07); Ruth Lathrop Sikes (until 1967)
signed: Saki no Hokusai Iitsu hitsu 前北斎為一筆
title: Snow on the Sumida River
